question:
Fill in the Blank:

Children are naturally ________ new things.
solution:
curious about

‘Curious about’ means eager to know.

Hindi Meaning: अधिक जानने की इच्छा

Complete Sentence:

Children are naturally curious about new things.

बच्चे नई चीजों के बारे में स्वाभाविक रूप से जिज्ञासु होते हैं।

Extra Example:

The child is curious about stars.

बच्चा तारों के बारे में जिज्ञासु है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

I’m ________ know what happens next.
solution:
curious to know

‘Curious to know’ is the correct phrase.

Hindi Meaning: सीखने के लिये उत्सुक

Complete Sentence:

I’m curious to know what happens next.

मैं जानने के लिए उत्सुक हूँ कि आगे क्या होगा।

Extra Example:

I am curious to know the result.

मैं परिणाम जानने को उत्सुक हूँ।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The flood caused serious ________ property.
solution:
damage to

‘Damage to’ is the correct collocation.

Hindi Meaning: नुकसान हुआ

Complete Sentence:

The flood caused serious damage to property.

बाढ़ ने संपत्ति को गंभीर नुकसान पहुँचाया।

Extra Example:

There was damage to the property.

संपत्ति को नुकसान पहुंचा।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Smoking increases the ________ cancer.
solution:
danger of

‘Danger of’ indicates risk.

Hindi Meaning: नुकसान की संभावना

Complete Sentence:

Smoking increases the danger of cancer.

धूम्रपान कैंसर के खतरे को बढ़ाता है।

Extra Example:

There is danger of flooding.

बाढ़ का खतरा है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He used to ________ electronics in the 90s.
solution:
deal in

‘Deal in’ means to trade in something.

Hindi Meaning: किसी चीज़ का व्यापार या कारोबार करना

Complete Sentence:

He used to deal in electronics in the 90s.

वह 90 के दशक में इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स का व्यापार करता था।

Extra Example:

He deals in electronics.

वह इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स का व्यापार करता है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The teacher decided to ________ punishment for the misconduct.
solution:
deal out

‘Deal out’ means to distribute (often punishment/cards).

Hindi Meaning: कुछ वितरित करना

Complete Sentence:

The teacher decided to deal out punishment for the misconduct.

शिक्षक ने अनुशासनहीनता के लिए सज़ा देने का निर्णय लिया।

Extra Example:

The teacher dealt out the question papers.

शिक्षक ने प्रश्न पत्र बांटे।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Please ________ this gift to your brother.
solution:
deal to

‘Deal to’ means to give/deliver to someone.

Hindi Meaning: कुछ देना या पहुंचाना (आमतौर पर नुकसान पहुंचाना)

Complete Sentence:

Please deal to this gift to your brother.

कृपया यह उपहार अपने भाई को दे दीजिए।

Extra Example:

He dealt a heavy blow to his opponent.

उसने अपने प्रतिद्वंद्वी को जोरदार चोट पहुंचाई।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The company signed a major ________ the foreign investors.
solution:
deal with

As a noun, ‘deal with’ refers to an agreement or arrangement between parties.

Hindi Meaning: एक समझौता या समझ जिसमें हैंडलिंग शामिल है

Complete Sentence:

The company signed a major deal with the foreign investors.

कंपनी ने विदेशी निवेशकों के साथ एक बड़ा समझौता किया।

Extra Example:

Our deal with the vendor is final.

विक्रेता के साथ हमारा सौदा पक्का है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The police were trained to ________ emergencies.
solution:
deal with

'Deal with' means to handle or manage.

Hindi Meaning: किसी स्थिति को संभालना या प्रबंधित करना

Complete Sentence:

The police were trained to deal with emergencies.

पुलिस को आपात स्थितियों से निपटने के लिए प्रशिक्षित किया गया।

Extra Example:

She knows how to deal with difficult customers.

वह कठिन ग्राहकों से निपटना जानती है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

There was a heated ________ the budget.
solution:
debate on

'Debate on' refers to a topic.

Hindi Meaning: चर्चा या तर्क

Complete Sentence:

There was a heated debate on the budget.

बजट पर तीव्र बहस हुई।

Extra Example:

There was a heated debate on the policy.

नीति पर जोरदार बहस हुई।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

We must ________ the best option available.
solution:
decide on

‘Decide on’ means to make a final choice.

Hindi Meaning: विकल्पों में से चुनने के लिए

Complete Sentence:

We must decide on the best option.

हमें सबसे अच्छे विकल्प का निर्णय करना चाहिए।

Extra Example:

They decided on a new strategy.

उन्होंने नई रणनीति पर फैसला किया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The committee will take a ________ the issue tomorrow.
solution:
decision on

‘Decision on’ refers to the topic being decided.

Hindi Meaning: अंतिम विकल्प या निर्णय

Complete Sentence:

The committee will take a decision on the issue.

समिति इस मुद्दे पर निर्णय लेगी।

Extra Example:

We await the decision on the matter.

हम मामले पर निर्णय का इंतज़ार कर रहे हैं।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

There was a significant ________ delivery.
solution:
delay in

'Delay in' refers to something being late.

Hindi Meaning: स्थगन

Complete Sentence:

There was a significant delay in delivery.

डिलीवरी में काफी देरी हुई।

Extra Example:

There was a delay in the delivery.

वितरण में देरी हुई।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The children ________ playing in the park.
solution:
delight in

‘Delight in’ means to enjoy greatly.

Hindi Meaning: खूब आनंद लेना

Complete Sentence:

The children delight in playing.

बच्चे खेलने में खुशी महसूस करते हैं।

Extra Example:

She delights in helping others.

उसे दूसरों की मदद करना पसंद है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

They were ________ the surprise gift.
solution:
delighted with

‘Delighted with’ means very pleased.

Hindi Meaning: बहुत खुश

Complete Sentence:

They were delighted with the surprise gift.

वे आश्चर्यजनक उपहार से बहुत खुश थे।

Extra Example:

She was delighted with the gift.

वह उपहार से बहुत खुश हुई।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

There is a great ________ skilled workers.
solution:
demand for

‘Demand for’ refers to the need for something.

Hindi Meaning: किसी चीज़ की इच्छा या आवश्यकता

Complete Sentence:

There is a great demand for skilled workers.

कुशल कामगारों की मांग अधिक है।

Extra Example:

The demand for electric cars is rising.

इलेक्ट्रिक कारों की मांग बढ़ रही है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The train will ________ platform 3 at 6 PM.
solution:
depart from

‘Depart from’ refers to leaving a location.

Hindi Meaning: किसी स्थान से प्रस्थान करना

Complete Sentence:

The train will depart from platform 3.

ट्रेन प्लेटफार्म 3 से प्रस्थान करेगी।

Extra Example:

The train departs from Platform 1.

ट्रेन प्लेटफॉर्म 1 से रवाना होती है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

We all ________ our parents for emotional support.
solution:
depend on

‘Depend on’ means to rely on someone or something.

Hindi Meaning: किसी व्यक्ति/वस्तु पर निर्भर रहना या भरोसा करना

Complete Sentence:

We all depend on our parents for emotional support.

हम सभी भावनात्मक समर्थन के लिए अपने माता-पिता पर निर्भर रहते हैं।

Extra Example:

Children depend on their parents.

बच्चे अपने माता-पिता पर निर्भर होते हैं।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Success often ________ your dedication and effort.
solution:
depend upon

‘Depend upon’ is a formal variation of ‘depend on’.

Hindi Meaning: (औपचारिक) किसी चीज़ से प्रभावित या निर्धारित होना

Complete Sentence:

Success often depend upon your dedication and effort.

सफलता अक्सर आपकी प्रतिबद्धता और प्रयास पर निर्भर करती है।

Extra Example:

Success depends upon hard work.

सफलता मेहनत पर निर्भर करती है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He is ________ his parents financially.
solution:
dependent on

‘Dependent on’ means relying upon.

Hindi Meaning: पर भरोसा

Complete Sentence:

He is dependent on his parents.

वह अपने माता-पिता पर निर्भर है।

Extra Example:

She is dependent on her parents.

वह अपने माता-पिता पर निर्भर है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He is still ________ his parents.
solution:
dependent upon

‘Dependent upon’ is a formal alternative to ‘on’.

Hindi Meaning: पर भरोसा

Complete Sentence:

He is still dependent upon his parents.

वह अभी भी अपने माता-पिता पर निर्भर है।

Extra Example:

We are dependent upon natural resources.

हम प्राकृतिक संसाधनों पर निर्भर हैं।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

This word is ________ Latin.
solution:
derive from

‘Derive from’ means to come from a source.

Hindi Meaning: किसी स्रोत से आना

Complete Sentence:

This word is derived from Latin.

यह शब्द लैटिन से लिया गया है।

Extra Example:

This word is derived from Latin.

यह शब्द लैटिन से लिया गया है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He has a strong ________ success.
solution:
desire for

‘Desire for’ expresses wish or longing.

Hindi Meaning: एक प्रबल इच्छा

Complete Sentence:

He has a strong desire for success.

उसमें सफलता की प्रबल इच्छा है।

Extra Example:

He has a desire for success.

वह सफलता की इच्छा रखता है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He did not ________ success after repeated failures.
solution:
despair of

‘Despair of’ means to lose hope.

Hindi Meaning: आशा खोना

Complete Sentence:

He did not despair of success.

बार-बार असफल होने के बाद भी उसने आशा नहीं छोड़ी।

Extra Example:

He despaired of winning.

उसने जीतने की उम्मीद छोड़ दी।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He was ________ fraud and taken to jail.
solution:
detain for

‘Detain for’ means to keep in custody for a reason.

Hindi Meaning: किसी को किसी कारण से अपने पास रखना

Complete Sentence:

He was detained for fraud.

उसे धोखाधड़ी के लिए गिरफ्तार किया गया।

Extra Example:

He was detained for questioning.

उसे पूछताछ के लिए रोका गया।
